message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $130.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I'm looking to spend a bit less.  How about $125?  I'm sure we can find a price that works for both of us.
I understand you're looking to save a bit, Bob. I can do $135, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
